title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average attendance, with a total of 11 data points.
Overall Average attendance has decreased over the Year
Average attendance is roughly constant from 2009 to 2019.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2012 and 2013.
Max Average attendance about 37918.0 was recorded at Year 2011
Min Average attendance about 28575.0 was recorded at Year 2016
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average attendance, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2016 to 2019.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2014 to 2016.
But, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2011 to 2013.
Conversely, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2009 to 2011.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2013 to 2014.
